snippet: A group of UK public sector pensions recommended on Monday that its member funds oppose Sports Direct's planned 2015 bonus share scheme, citing concerns over the sports retailer's remuneration of its chief executive officer....

headline.print_headline: Pensions Group Opposes Sports Direct Bonus Share Plan
headline.main: Pensions Group Opposes Sports Direct Bonus Share Plan

lead_paragraph: A group of UK public sector pensions recommended on Monday that its member funds oppose Sports Direct's planned 2015 bonus share scheme, citing concerns over the sports retailer's remuneration of its chief executive officer.
